BigDoor

Seattle, WA

http://www.bigdoor.com/

We're a gamification platform – we make it easy for anyone to add fun, relevant loyalty programs to their site or app, storing all their virtual economy data with us.

Lots of people are focused on badges and leaderboards – and we do that – but we consider that the simple stuff. We're way ahead of that. We're also working with major brands (a few we've worked with this year: Major League Baseball, Nickelodeon, Dell).

We're venture-backed, still small but growing fast.

Positions:

* Full-stack web developer: Python, Django, JavaScript.

* DevOps: Linux, Apache, MySQL.

* Content manager (aka Quest Master): Help our bigger partners create and maintain their virtual economies.

Don't be shy: hr@bigdoor.com (or just check my profile to contact me instead)

http://www.bigdoor.com/about-us/careers/
